author: CBR
description:
Conan isn’t a cameo anymore. In this clip, Jim Zub explains how Conan went from a hoped-for anniversary "six pages" to a full-throttle return. Conan's scope gets bigger, the art teams level up, and the lyrical voice finally snaps into place.

🎙️ Clip from CBR’s Heroes Journey Podcast – Episode 4.

- Watch the full episode here: https://youtu.be/rTl1KaQGa08
- More Heroes Journey Podcast episodes: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLfpipp6KbWs4apsUf5fIcxVw1cpaXXWxg

#JimZub #Conan #Comics #HeroesJourney #CBR

title: Conan returns: from six pages to center stage 💥 #conan #jimzub #heroesjourney #cbr
